snippet.title: Triku / ARC INDIE and Chao Games Showcase trailer
snippet.description:
Meet Triku, a flying action-adventure platformer that's made for fans of Monster World IV and Shantae. Set in an undescribed world, you must work through tasks with wide difficulty for each area and cute spooky characters to dialog to for more information about the game.

Try the demo on Itch.io and SAGE for now🌟 
https://plantytsg.itch.io/triku
https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/triku.2181/

Follow me on🌟
💚Newgrounds: https://rb.gy/seqe0b
💚Pixil Art: https://rb.gy/pzz08z
